00029 using std::vector;

00036 class Revision
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   Revision();
00040   Revision(string revision);
00041   ~Revision();

00044   bool operator<(const Revision& refRevision) const;
00045   bool operator<=(const Revision& refRevision) const;

00047   bool operator>=(const Revision& refRevision) const;
00048   bool operator>(const Revision& refRevision) const;
00049   string GetString() const;
00050   void Set(string revision);
00051 private:
00052   void SetValues();
00054   string mRevisionStr;
00056   int mAlphaNumber;
00058   int mBetaNumber;
00060   int mRCNumber;
